channel.title: IMPSoft's I-Bot goes public!
channel.description:
[img]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/1701/titlebarll0.png[/img] “I Bot do you bot?” www.impsoft.net If you haven’t already known I-Bot went public on September 13, 2006, @ 12:47:33 AM !! It is still in development as a few of the down-the-road features are yet to be coded. Before downloading please read IMPSoft's rules: http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?cat=12
please no ripping or any derivitives of this.
D/L : http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php/topic,14.0.html "WTF is a SVN?" go here: http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?cat=1 More info on I-Bot: http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?cat=6 http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/9338/ibot1af9.png [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/9338/ibot1af9.png[/img] http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/8247/ibot2gi8.png [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/8247/ibot2gi8.png[/img] http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/7073/ibot3fp7.png [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/7073/ibot3fp7.png[/img] IBOT made by ruler. It includes many contributions from leading community members. Their will be a "about" page to list contributions. It started out after much reading of how java events are managed. It began as UBI (Universal Bot Interface) which allowed any bot to send mouse clicks, mouse movements, keys to a applet. It was first ported to SRL (a include for SCAR) by GenoDemon. Next it was ported to a client made by Cruel who using windows api got the applet to be off screen and aquire a bitmap of it thru the windows api. It can trick clients into thinking they have "focus", ect. It can also block events. This allows multiple applets to run on the same OS and be tricked into thinking they have focus and they are recieving mouse events. Color Recogntion -Everything scar can do -Advance methods that can return arrays of all matches -Direct access to the pixel arrays -OCR near complete -Extendable Threads -Bot GUI -Mouse Controller -Random thread -Script thread Advantages -faster than scar -Long Lasting -low up keep -less dectable -Very powerful and well thoughtout gui -Pixel explorer to speed script development -less updating if any at all Disadvantages -not as efficent as a client edit in theory -scripts take more intelligence to produce -Few currently in existance

item.title: IMPSoft's I-Bot goes public!
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:38, topic:14461”]Topic cleansed of spam, please don’t do this again, thanks.

btw, most of it was not ruler or genodemon, most of it was directed at them from other people.[/quote]

thnaks to you, wow form like 5 pages to 2[br][size=1]Posted at: September 22, 2006, 04:12:13 PM[/size][hr]Report anything that breaks or stuff that is not acting like it did before lol

4 applets:
http://www.impsoft.net/public/lol.JPG

new feature: capture to HD , saves a bmp of the current applet to your bot folder.
you can call it from a scipt

import impsoft.ibot.managers.BitMapManger

theBot.theBitMapManger.shootToHD(theBot.theBitMapManger.getBufferedImage(0))

Also some tweaking in the bot behind the scenes.
also to move camera:
sendKey(KeyEvent.VK_UP), ect.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:29, topic:14461”]I just vastly updated the gettoptext method. The issue with getting the toptext are the following:

  • the line of text is randomly vertically positioned a bit.
  • some of my bitmaps/bitmask hybrids are not correct.
  • their are random 0,1,2 pixels between the chars
  • the char color can be different eg . “level - 56”
  • the chars are blended with the background behind them


[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 01:47:26 AM[/size][hr]http://www.impsoft.net/public/clip0005.avi[/quote]

WHOA NICE!!! OMFG :eek:

Read full topic
